Activity: Log in to the system and check emails regarding the EHR collection project and seasonal influenza analysis tasks.
Make initial contact with @EHR Vendor Liaison to discuss the EHR integration timelines and any challenges faced.
Collaborate with @Clinical Lead and @Registered Nurse team members to gather necessary documentation and protocols for the EHR collection process.
Participate in a team meeting with all staff to discuss the main goals for the week regarding EHR and influenza analysis.
Review the data collection methods and ensure they are compliant with medical standards.
Send an email to @Health Informatics Specialist and @Medical Records Specialist to request data samples for initial analysis.
Work on analyzing the seasonal influenza data collected previously and prepare initial findings.
Check in with @Quality Assurance Tester to discuss the quality check process for the data collected.
Wrap up daily work, organize notes, and plan for the next day.
